TopicTitle: Roll and Pitch axis locked after switching between a craft in lko and one on the surface of the Mun

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows 10 | CPU: ryzen 7 2700x | GPU: rtx 2060 6gb | RAM: 16gb 3000mhz

 

I switched from my craft waiting in lko to one on the surface of the mun in order to timewarp to the transfer window, then when I switched back I wasn't able to control the pitch and roll axis and any input into those would only change my yaw, even when reentering my craft was stuck in its pitch and roll position and only the yaw axis changed, I also tried quicksaving/quickloading and nothing changed, went back to the ksc and then to the craft nothing changed, after changing to my lko craft the lighting was also all off as if I were much further away from the sun than I actually was.
